constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 37 (Friday, February 26, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. SHERRILL:
H.R. 1437.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Clause 18 of Section 8 or Article 1 of the Constitution of
the United States of America.
[Page H860]
title: Further Continuing Appropriations and Extensions Act, 2023
